title: Mahur Renuka Devi Temple
subtitle: A Sacred Shakti Peetha in Nanded District
overview: Mahur, in the Nanded district of Maharashtra, is home to the ancient Renuka Devi Temple — one of the three and a half Shakti Peethas in the state. The temple sits atop a lush green hill, surrounded by forests and mythological significance.
Renuka Devi is considered the mother of Lord Parashurama, and devotees visit Mahur to seek her blessings for strength, wisdom, and protection.

highlights.title: Renuka Devi Temple
highlights.description: Main shrine located on a hilltop, offering a scenic view of the surrounding valley.

highlights.title: Hilltop Pilgrimage
highlights.description: The climb of 400 steps to reach the temple is both challenging and spiritually fulfilling.

geography.intro: Mahur is a town in the Kinwat Taluka of Nanded district, located near the Maharashtra–Telangana border.

climate.description: Mahur experiences pleasant winters and hot summers, with monsoon showers enhancing its greenery.

geography.conclusion: Best visited from October to February when the weather is cool and comfortable for temple visits.

activities.title: Darshan of Renuka Devi
activities.description: Seek blessings from Goddess Renuka Devi and enjoy the peaceful surroundings of the temple.
info: Aarti and Abhishek rituals are conducted daily.
Special poojas are organized during Navratri.

activities.title: Hill Trek to the Temple
activities.description: The climb to the top offers scenic views and a spiritual journey.
info: Sheltered steps and resting spots available.

activities.title: Visit Datta Mandir
activities.description: Near Renuka temple, dedicated to Lord Dattatreya — believed to have meditated here.

attractions.title: Renuka Devi Temple
attractions.description: Main temple dedicated to the mother of Parashurama.

attractions.title: Dattatreya Temple
attractions.description: Ancient temple situated on another nearby hill.

marineLife.intro: Though Mahur is far from the sea, its spiritual energy and natural surroundings nurture the soul.

items.title: Divine Feminine Power
items.description: Renuka Devi symbolizes strength, compassion, and motherhood.

items.title: Nature and Tranquility
items.description: The temple is surrounded by dense forests, adding serenity to devotion.

conclusion: Mahur combines spirituality and scenic beauty in one journey.
Perfect for pilgrims and nature lovers alike.

howToReach.title: By Rail
details: Kinwat is the nearest railway station (50 km) connected to Nanded and Adilabad.
Taxis and buses are available from Kinwat to Mahur.

howToReach.title: By Road
details: Regular MSRTC buses operate from Nanded, Kinwat, and Yavatmal.
Private vehicles can easily access the temple road.

bookingTips.description: Navratri is the peak season; book accommodation early.
Early morning darshan is peaceful before the crowds arrive.
Carry water and light snacks if trekking to the top.
